original_text: And I will make for them a covenant on that day with the beasts of the field, the birds of the heavens, and the creeping things of the ground. And I will abolish the bow, the sword, and war from the land, and I will make you lie down in safety.
korean_text: 그 날에는 내가 그들을 위하여 들짐승과 공중의 새와 땅의 곤충과 더불어 언약을 맺으며 또 이 땅에서 활과 칼을 꺾어 전쟁을 없이하고 그들로 평안히 눕게 하리라

sentences.original_text: And I will make for them a covenant on that day
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그 날에 그들을 위한 언약을 맺을 것이요

sentences.original_text: with the beasts of the field,
and the creeping things of the ground.
And I will abolish the bow,
and I will make you lie down in safety.
